casebody.data:
Albert LOPEZ
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 15, 2016.

John C. Drapp III, Bridgeport, in support of the petition.

Linda Currie-Zeffiro, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Albert Lopez' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 901, 137 A.3d 118 (2016), is denied.
